panels.description: Lloc on es troba situat el Centre i si es situa damunt el punt es poden observar els sensors que conté.

targets.rawSql: SELECT * FROM iotib2.centros where Name = "Center 3"

panels.title: CENTER 3

targets.rawSql: select  milesight_payload.BatteryLevel from data join milesight_payload ON data.ID = milesight_payload.ID where milesight_payload.Tipo_dec = '01' order by trx_time desc limit 1;

select temperature from milesight_payload join data on data.id = milesight_payload.id where (tipo_dec='01' or tipo_dec='03') and data.dev_eui ="24-e1-24-12-6a-23-33-97" order by trx_time desc limit 1;
select presure from milesight_payload join data on data.id = milesight_payload.id where (tipo_dec='01' or tipo_dec='03') and data.dev_eui ="24-e1-24-12-6a-23-33-97" order by trx_time desc limit 1;
select Co2 from milesight_payload join data on data.id = milesight_payload.id where (tipo_dec='01' or tipo_dec='03') and data.dev_eui ="24-e1-24-12-6a-23-33-97" order by trx_time desc limit 1;

panels.description: Avisa si el sensor ha detectat moviment, i avisa quan deixa de detectarlo.

targets.rawSql: select  milesight_payload.ValorPresencia,HayPresencia from data join milesight_payload ON data.ID = milesight_payload.ID where (Tipo_dec = '01' or Tipo_dec = '03') and devEui = "24-e1-24-53-8d-05-17-44" order by trx_time desc limit 1 ;

panels.title: Detector de Presencia

targets.rawSql: select humidity from milesight_payload join data on data.id = milesight_payload.id where (tipo_dec='01' or tipo_dec='03') and data.dev_eui ="24-e1-24-12-6a-23-33-97" order by trx_time desc limit 1;
select  milesight_payload.BatteryLevel from data join milesight_payload ON data.ID = milesight_payload.ID where milesight_payload.Tipo_dec = '01' order by trx_time desc limit 1;
select  milesight_payload.BatteryLevel from data join milesight_payload ON data.ID = milesight_payload.ID where milesight_payload.Tipo_dec = '01' order by trx_time desc limit 1;

select  milesight_payload.BatteryLevel from data join milesight_payload ON data.ID = milesight_payload.ID where milesight_payload.Tipo_dec = '01' and dev_eui="24-e1-24-12-6a-23-33-97" order by trx_time desc limit 1;
select trx_time, temperature from data join milesight_payload on data.id = milesight_payload.id  where (tipo_dec='01' or tipo_dec='03') and data.dev_eui ="24-e1-24-12-6a-23-33-97"
select trx_time, Co2 from data join milesight_payload on data.id = milesight_payload.id  where (tipo_dec='01' or tipo_dec='03') and data.dev_eui ="24-e1-24-12-6a-23-33-97"

select  milesight_payload.BatteryLevel from data join milesight_payload ON data.ID = milesight_payload.ID where milesight_payload.Tipo_dec = '01' and dev_eui="24-e1-24-53-8d-05-17-44" order by trx_time desc limit 1;
select  milesight_payload.BatteryLevel from data join milesight_payload ON data.ID = milesight_payload.ID where milesight_payload.Tipo_dec = '01' order by trx_time desc limit 1;

panels.description: Calcul de paquets perduts, del medidor exterior, de cada mes, limitant-se als 6 darrers mesos.

targets.rawSql: SELECT porcentajePaquetesPerdidos,periodo FROM iotib2.paquetesperdidos where dev_eui = "24-e1-24-12-6a-23-33-97" limit 6

panels.title: Outdoor_Ambiance_Sensor

targets.rawSql: select trx_time, presure from data join milesight_payload on data.id = milesight_payload.id  where (tipo_dec='01' or tipo_dec='03') and data.dev_eui ="24-e1-24-12-6a-23-33-97"
select trx_time, humidity from data join milesight_payload on data.id = milesight_payload.id  where (tipo_dec='01' or tipo_dec='03') and data.dev_eui ="24-e1-24-12-6a-23-33-97"

panels.description: Calcul de paquets perduts, del detector de presència interior, de cada mes, limitant-se als 6 darrers mesos.

targets.rawSql: SELECT porcentajePaquetesPerdidos,periodo FROM iotib2.paquetesperdidos where dev_eui = "24-e1-24-53-8d-05-17-44" limit 6

panels.title: Indoor_Motion_Sensor

targets.rawSql: select  milesight_payload.BatteryLevel from data join milesight_payload ON data.ID = milesight_payload.ID where milesight_payload.Tipo_dec = '01' order by trx_time desc limit 1;

panels.description: Mostra un gràfic de la relació senyal-soroll de les senyals transmeses pels tres dispositius.

targets.rawSql: SELECT data_rate,count(data_rate) from data where (dev_eui = "24-e1-24-12-6a-23-33-97" or dev_eui = "24-e1-24-53-8d-05-17-44") and direction = "up" and port != '0' GROUP BY data_rate

panels.title: Data_Rate

panels.description: Relació senyal-soroll de les senyals transmeses pels uplinks dels dispositius del centre.

targets.rawSql: SELECT trx_time,SNR FROM data where (dev_eui = "24-e1-24-12-6a-23-33-97" or dev_eui = "24-e1-24-53-8d-05-17-44") and direction ="up" and  port != '0'

panels.title: SNR

panels.description: Potència del senyal rebut de les senyals transmeses dels upliks dels dispositius del centre.

targets.rawSql: SELECT trx_time,RSSI_UP FROM data where (dev_eui = "24-e1-24-12-6a-23-33-97" or dev_eui = "24-e1-24-53-8d-05-17-44" or dev_eui="a8-40-41-f0-61-87-16-d5") and direction ="up" and  port != '0'

panels.title: RSSI
